last_episode_to_air.name: Sasha Velour
last_episode_to_air.overview: From her family at home to her family on stage. Sasha returns to her roots to see where it all started and enjoys the wild celebration it has become.

name: NightGowns
overview: Part performance documentary, part portrait, this series sheds light on Sasha Velour's wildly creative work with each member of her unique ensemble crafting the lip-sync performances of their wildest dreams.

episodes.name: Welcome to NightGowns
episodes.overview: Sasha Velour, it’s time to take the stage. See each individual universe of her vision take shape, starting with one on the edge.

episodes.name: The Ensemble
episodes.overview: It’s their moment. Their expression. Their liberation. The cast comes together to celebrate the diversity of drag. And nothing can stop them.

episodes.name: Sasha Colby
episodes.overview: Sasha Colby. From Miss Continental to master stage performer. Her NightGowns number will make you fall in love.

episodes.name: Vander Van Odd
episodes.overview: Vander Von Odd brings elegant horror to their performance and casts a spell of queerness everyone will always remember.

episodes.name: Neon Calypso
episodes.overview: Neon Calypso is here to tell her story. Let her inner light shine and run towards the stage with a strong new attitude.

episodes.name: K.James
episodes.overview: K. James. The sex symbol of Brooklyn drag. He may be shy offstage, but when he performs, you better watch out.

episodes.name: Untitled Queen
episodes.overview: Experience abstract art as drag. Untitled Queen takes the stage and taps into something spiritual and totally unique.

episodes.name: Sasha Velour
episodes.overview: From her family at home to her family on stage. Sasha returns to her roots to see where it all started and enjoys the wild celebration it has become.
